pkgmetadata.longdescription: Likelihood Based Optimal Partitioning for Indicator Species Analysis // Likelihood based optimal partitioning for indicator species analysis. Finding the best binary partition for each species based on model selection, possibly controlling for modifying/confounding variables as described in Kemencei et al. (2014) doi:10.1556/ComEc.15.2014.2.6. The package also implements various measures of uncertainty based on binary partitions, optimal multinomial partitioning, and exploratory suitability indices, with native support for parallel computations.
